actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to ban the exportation of crude oil or refined petroleum products derived from Federal land, and for other purposes.
short_title: American Oil for American Families Act of 2013

summary.text: American Oil for American Families Act of 2013 - Bans the export from the United States of petroleum extracted from public lands in the United States (including lands located on the outer Continental Shelf [OCS]), or a petroleum product produced from such petroleum.

titles.title: American Oil for American Families Act of 2013
A bill to ban the exportation of crude oil or refined petroleum products derived from Federal land, and for other purposes.
